title: LoL Worlds 2018 Public Viewing Partys ?!
body:
Hello Riot,

are you aware of any Public Viewing parties taking place during worlds ? Specifically for Germany and the area around FFM (Frankfurt am Main) , but also a complete list of all Public Viewing parties for the EUW region (sorted by country perhaps) would be nice.

2 years ago there was a big PV event at my town (Mainz), it was fully booked and received a lot of positive feedback, but they didn't host it again unfortunately (https://euw.leagueoflegends.com/de/news/community/community-events/erlebe-worlds-deiner-nahe). If you could tell me more about the overall process of making a PV event (do they need a permission, do you approach them or do they approach you etc.) i could ask them to maybe host it again. Due to my personal experience and heavy engagement with LoL...that sounded strange... i am pretty confident to say that still a lot of people would attend such an event and would higly prefer it to watch worlds in company on a big screen.
